src:
Jadi Dirjen Pajak Baru, Ini Rekam Jejak Suryo Utomo
01 Nov 2019, 03:40 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Suryo Utomo resmi menjabat Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak Kementerian Keuangan (Kemenkeu) yang baru. Ia telah dilantik oleh Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati hari ini, Jumat (1/11/2019).Bagaimana rekam jejaknya?Suryo Utomo lahir di Semarang, 26 Maret 1969. Ia memperoleh gelar Sarjana Ekonomi dari Universitas Diponegoro (Undip) Semarang pada tahun 1992.Setelah itu, ia memperoleh gelar Master of Business Taxation dari University of Southern California di tahun 1998.Lalu, gelar terakhirnya ialah Doctor of Philosophy in Taxation University Kebangsaan Malaysia. Suryo memperoleh gelar itu pada tahun 2019.Suryo banyak menghabiskan karirnya di bidang perpajakan. Tercatat, ia pernah menjabat sebagai Kepala Kanwil DJP Jawa Tengah I (2010-2011), Direktur Peraturan Perpajakan I (2011-2012), Direktur Ekstensifikasi dan Penilaian (2015), dan Staf Ahli Menteri Keuangan Bidang Kepatuhan Pajak (2015-2019). Kemudian, ia pun diangkat menjadi Dirjen Pajak.Adapun aktivitas Suryo dalam empat tahun terakhir yakni penyusunan RUU Pengampunan Pajak dan aturan pelaksanaannya, penyusunan RUU dan Perpu Akses Informasi Keuangan untuk Kepentingan Perpajakan, menjalankan tax reform, lalu penyusunan RUU omnibus law.Simak Video "Gaya Cool Dirjen Pajak Saat Mengisi Kuliah Umum di UI"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
So New Director General of Taxes, This Suryo Utomo Track Record
01 Nov 2019, 03:40 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Suryo Utomo officially serves as the new Director General (Dirjen) of the Ministry of Finance Tax (Ministry of Finance). He was appointed by Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati today, Friday (11/01/2019). How is his track record? Suryo Utomo was born in Semarang, March 26, 1969. He obtained his Bachelor of Economics degree from Diponegoro University (Undip) Semarang in 1992 After that, he obtained his Master of Business Taxation from the University of Southern California in 1998. Then, his last degree was Doctor of Philosophy in Taxation at the Nationality University of Malaysia. Suryo obtained the title in 2019.Suryo spent much of his career in taxation. Noted, he has served as Head of the Central Java Regional Tax Office I (2010-2011), Director of Taxation Regulations I (2011-2012), Director of Extensification and Assessment (2015), and Expert Staff of the Minister of Finance in Tax Compliance (2015-2019). Then, he was appointed as the Director General of Taxes. As for Suryo's activities in the last four years, namely the compilation of the Tax Amnesty Bill and its implementing regulations, the preparation of the Bill and the Regulation on Access to Financial Information for Taxation Purposes, carrying out tax reform, then drafting the omnibus law bill. Cool Director General of Tax When Filling Public Lectures at UI "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / eds)
